mapper.select: SELECT USERNAME AS CODE , USERNAME AS NAME FROM ALL_USERS WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY USERNAME DESC

SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW_NO , TAB.TABLE_NAME , TAB_COM.COMMENTS , TAB.OWNER FROM ALL_TABLES TAB , ALL_TAB_COMMENTS TAB_COM WHERE TAB.OWNER = TAB_COM.OWNER AND TAB.TABLE_NAME = TAB_COM.TABLE_NAME AND ( TAB.TABLE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{CODE_NAME} || '%' OR TAB_COM.COMMENTS LIKE '%' || #{CODE_NAME} || '%' ) AND TAB.OWNER = #{CODE} ORDER BY TAB.TABLE_NAME

SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(COL.COLUMN_ID) AS COL_NO , COL.COLUMN_NAME AS COLUMN_NAME , COM.COMMENTS AS COMMENTS , CASE WHEN COL.DATA_TYPE='NUMBER' THEN 'NUMBER(' || COL.DATA_PRECISION || (CASE WHEN COL.DATA_SCALE=0 THEN ' ' ELSE ',' || COL.DATA_SCALE END) || ')' WHEN COL.DATA_TYPE='DATE' THEN 'DATE' WHEN COL.DATA_TYPE='DATETIME' THEN 'DATE' ELSE COL.DATA_TYPE || '(' || COL.DATA_LENGTH || ')' END AS VW_DATA_TYPE , CASE WHEN COL.NULLABLE = 'N' THEN 'NOT NULL' ELSE ' ' END AS COL_NULL , COL.DATA_TYPE AS DATA_TYPE , COL.DATA_LENGTH AS DATA_LENGTH , CASE WHEN COL_CON.POSITION >= 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE ' ' END AS COL_PK , '' AS COL_DEF , '' AS REMK_TEXT , COL.TABLE_NAME||TRIM(TO_CHAR(COL.COLUMN_ID,'000')) AS ORD FROM ALL_TAB_COLUMNS COL , ALL_COL_COMMENTS COM , ( SELECT OWNER , TABLE_NAME , COLUMN_NAME , POSITION FROM ALL_CONS_COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = #{TABLE_NAME} AND POSITION IS NOT NULL ) COL_CON WHERE COL.OWNER = COM.OWNER AND COL.TABLE_NAME = COM.TABLE_NAME AND COL.COLUMN_NAME = COM.COLUMN_NAME AND COL.TABLE_NAME = #{TABLE_NAME} AND COL.OWNER = COL_CON.OWNER(+) AND COL.TABLE_NAME = COL_CON.TABLE_NAME(+) AND COL.COLUMN_NAME = COL_CON.COLUMN_NAME(+) AND COL.OWNER = #{CODE} ORDER BY ORD
